front.title: Blaster Rifle
front.gametext: Use 2 Force to deploy on your warrior. May target a character, creature or vehicle using 2 Force. Draw destiny. Target hit if destiny +1 > defense value.
front.lore: Stormtrooper BlasTech E-11 blaster rifle. Can convert from a pistol to a rifle configuration by using extendable stock. Carries 100 shots. Military issue only.

combo: Blaster Rifle + Blaster Scope Target at an adjacent site.
